website_summaries.verdict: This model doesn't have a lot of bells and whistles, but it's a good entry-level fish-finding tool for the budget-conscious and the occasional fishing enthusiast.
pros: Features both sonar and GPS in an affordably priced unit
Not difficult to learn to use, even for beginners who are new to using fish finders
cons: Fewer features and capabilities than pricier options

customer_reviews.title: Great Fish Finder but Cheap Clips
customer_reviews.text: Great fish finder but the clips that hold the cables down on the transom are plastic and broke the first time he took it out. It was 20.00 for a new plastic one or 30.00 for a metal one (plus postage) . The Protection Plan that I bought extra did not cover it... If you get this you might order metal clips to avoid being out fishing and have your fish finder malfunction due to broken clips.
customer_reviews.author: Rattail

customer_reviews.title: Very  Confusing as to what features you get since all features on all models are grouped together
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this I was under the impression it had Downward Imaging. The Ad is very confusing because it lists all the features ALL the models have. This is very misleading. Even when you take the instruction manual out of the box it lists features the model doesn't have. I'm more than a little disappointed since I purchased it as a gift for someone and was talking it up about all that it was going to do, Downward imaging especially . Be Very careful and do your research as to what model has what features before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit so far
customer_reviews.text: Great unit so far. Replaced an old Humminbird that worked equally as well. Having GPS is awesome coming from a non-gps model.
customer_reviews.author: Christian R.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most fish finders this one actually finds fish and the depths are very accurate. I am very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: dave grams

customer_reviews.title: It is not the sellers fault .
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the product and installed all components and the main head will not power up . Has a warranty so called hummingbird. Said they would send out a 110v power supply which took two weeks . Now that the power supply didn’t start the unit. Now I have to send unit in for repair. When I replaced my out dated lowrance unit I cut cables and put it all in the trash. Here I sit want to go to Lake Erie without a gps or locator.
customer_reviews.author: David Hatter

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Lots of little tweaks to make when fishing is slow, but works great right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: j.a. mcurdy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it on time easy installation very easy to use I love it Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Lilia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: .Easy to operate. Excellent display. Great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: James Ruis

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but rudimentary boat mount.
customer_reviews.text: The electronics are great. The technical aspects of the unit take time to learn so read the instructions. Great screen definition. However, the boat mount is rudimentary. I would have expected more versatility of movement. There is a design flaw in the transducer mount that causes a rooster tail when boating at full speed. I modified it myself and it works fine now. Customers should not have to do this modification for the price paid for this unit.
customer_reviews.author: robert s scott

customer_reviews.title: Short Chord
customer_reviews.text: when the boat is moving over 5 mph the depth readings either disappear or it gives readings from 800-1,000 ft. the wire for the sonar barely reached the dash and I do not have a large boat. I mainly bought it for the GPS and it has a lot of features I haven't even tried to use yet.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Dont know how it works came without gps now have to reorder
customer_reviews.text: U never get what you order mine came with no gps tired of ordering and waiting then you dont get what you order
customer_reviews.author: jeff pate

customer_reviews.title: Too little memory for waypoint
customer_reviews.text: It can save 500 points maypoint only. Beyond them, waypoints memory will disappear when power off. It is unbelieve product. I had reset to manufactory setting. It is same and no good product. Another is memory card door. I need to remove it out for card insert or move out. It will easy lost.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: nice little unit but poor quality mounts
customer_reviews.text: just installed and seems to work fine. My only complaint is that for $300 i feel the mount should be better, its cheap and doesn't even swivel. The transducer mount doesnt hold transducer very tight at all, the cheap piranha unit bought has a much better transducer mount. Luckily its on a slow boat or it would kick up
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME HUMMINGBIRD UNIT
customer_reviews.text: awesome unit it has lots of bells and whistles better than my old 586c :)
customer_reviews.author: peter  w hovey

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it and uses it on his kayak!
customer_reviews.author: Cris Perry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome fish locator for the money. Crisp clear detail, easy to install,lots of features for the money. I would highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it. We have only had a chance to use it once but he likes the different views

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: The mounting bracket that holds the transponder on the boat cracked. The really terrible part is, I haven’t traveled more than 100yrds in the water. Had engine troubles, pulled it out of water and the bracket was already cracked. Terrible quality
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey K Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Mark's fish
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have is it will at times ot display bottom depth.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives me the edge I needed when on the water looking for the big ones.

customer_reviews.title: It shuts off after turning on last about 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: depth finder doesn't work ,can't set it for feet of depth .instructions are awful.

customer_reviews.title: Will power off on it own not worth the trouble don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I returned the unit it powers off out the blue the I had to unplug the power cord to get it back on

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Install was not too bad. Getting used to the unit but overall happy.

customer_reviews.text: Used with my terrova that only supports traditional sonar. Works as described.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work. Had it a few weeks before ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Had it a few weeks before I could install it, now I have to return it to the manufacturer instead of amazon. Big hassle.

customer_reviews.title: No Downward Imaging
customer_reviews.text: I thought all I needed to do was purchase transducer with the downward imaging. It's still not giving me that nice downward images. Just shows the 2d.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are not very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking unit but the instructions are not the easiest to navigate.Hopefully it will get better as it gets more use

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: My husband is using it on his boat in Baja, Mexico. It was easy to set up and use.

customer_reviews.text: Transducer wire was not long enough for a pontoon boat.

customer_reviews.title: You will need to purchase a 3 amp fuse assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I like the bigger screen . It's easier to read from a distance.

customer_reviews.title: Let's Go Fishing!
customer_reviews.text: I switched from the Lowrance to the Humminbird.... GREAT CHOICE!

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this unit again
customer_reviews.text: I only had this Fishfinder for a little over a year and the terminals for the power and the transducer corroded and unit stopped working
customer_reviews.author: gc

customer_reviews.title: Hard to set up
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for a month & still don’t have it working right.

customer_reviews.title: Hummingbird is the way to go  !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use ! Easy to set up Must have the lake master chip with it

customer_reviews.title: Scratch on screen
customer_reviews.text: Received unit yesterday and noticed a scratch on the screen. I have still not installed it so do not know if it was damaged. Box did seem to be opened. What could of been the cause of this scratch ?
customer_reviews.author: Grayson

customer_reviews.title: No good if you can't use it
customer_reviews.text: Totally useless can't get extension cable to finish installing unit pulling it out will buy a different brand never again hummingbird
customer_reviews.author: peggy cole

customer_reviews.title: great grafics
customer_reviews.text: there is a lot of features that I still need to learn but I love the graphics and all the features that I have become familiar with.

customer_reviews.title: Hummingbird depth finder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent depth finder!!! Will definitely be buying another one in the future!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Useless maps
customer_reviews.text: The sonar wont read at anything over 200 feet. Hard to use. I am extremely disappointed considering the good reviews.

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Used for 1 month and it doesn’t even turn on anymore..

customer_reviews.text: Doesn't not work right gave as a gift nd it doesn't work right problem is I cant get it back from person I gave to as a gift

customer_reviews.title: Good unit when it’s powered
customer_reviews.text: When the unit gets the least bit hot it cuts off.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA C.

customer_reviews.title: There is no side imaging
customer_reviews.text: Did not do everything it said it would do. Was specifically looking for a fish finder that had down imaging as well as sidescan and this unit seem to fot the bill until I got it. It only does structure scan but by the description you would think it was a totalscan transducer.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Husband fell in love with this! I'm so glad I ordered it for him!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used all the capabilities but is working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Great gps and fish finder
customer_reviews.text: I run coastal waters in south lousisna. Its a great navigator/gps. And fish finder is really good. Set up was simple. Would recomend. To some one else. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew  goodman

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It works for me
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It works for me. What a great product .👍

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice depth finder and gps! Very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald O Highsmith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend love it thought i haven't seen it help him catch a fish

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, may need inside hull mount transducer. Cannot get depth accurately above 6 knots

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Screen freezes after about 45 minutes of use and power switch will not turn the unit off.
customer_reviews.author: rlcrank

customer_reviews.title: so far so good show picture very well
customer_reviews.text: so far so good show picture very well, still learning all the setups
customer_reviews.author: mr.Q

customer_reviews.title: Good clear and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice clear fast shipping and works great. Trying to figure out the di though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good solid unit so far
customer_reviews.text: Works well and does exactly what you would expect. Good solid unit so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get the best expect the best!
customer_reviews.text: Super machine, everything you need in a compact package! What a deal! Great features, bright, clear color screen, easy to move from GPS to Fishfinder or combine both on screen along with digital readings of other info.
customer_reviews.author: Willie B. III

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice!
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders, GPS that will give you MPH and button to mark locations, you will need a micro SD Card to store marking locations and other area maps.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Nikon User

customer_reviews.title: Screen to Small
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and installed. Problem is the screen is too small. Spend the extra and get at least 7". I have contacted seller about how I can get a 9" model.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S

customer_reviews.title: It has some nice features and is easy to read and use
customer_reviews.text: I bought and used this some at the end of last season in Maine. It has some nice features and is easy to read and use, though in the first several outings you might want to take the operations manual along with with you. With practice, however, it becomes clear and intuitive fairly quickly. Installation is a bit tricky for a first timer like me, but was manageable with some careful attention to the instructions before and during the installation process.
customer_reviews.author: murmur

customer_reviews.title: Great fish finder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fish finder/sonar which replaced an older Humminbird with a black and white screen that died after years of use. I would highly recommend this unit to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: FormosaTiger

customer_reviews.title: Hummingbird HELIX 5
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a while trying to find a good Chart plotter with charts of US costal water's with out paying 6 or 7 hundred. So I took a shot in the dark with the Helix 5 chirp g2. It has a very detailed chart for the gulf coast. Everyone else talked-about the fish finder I needed the charts. And i like that i can up date it every time NOHA up dates it's charts or just buy one on SD card I think it is going to work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: cmg

customer_reviews.title: pleased with this depth finder, why would it ship with a sonar less capable then the finder?
customer_reviews.text: the smaller screen does not bother me, unlike other reviews that say spend the extra $200 for a bigger screen. It still has all the same great features. Updated maps and getting maps for your favorite lake is really easy. My one issue with this unit is the SONAR that ships with it. The unit is a very capable digital SONAR CHIRP which provides better fidelity than the standard dual-band frequency. If you go on Huminbird's website, a replacement dual band SONAR is $10 less than the SONAR with the CHIRP capabilities. Why would they not include a CHIRP capable SONAR especially with only a $10 price difference?
customer_reviews.author: army94

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit mainly for the Chartplotter, but I wanted to have an idea of depth. I mounted the transducer internally to in the bow of the boat. Eventually, I need to get an InHull Transducer, but for now this works well. I can't say much about the fish finder or contour ability, but for what I needed and the Chartplotter it was perfect. I used the base map and had exactly what I needed for my Inner coastal and ocean voyage.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fish finder and GPS unit!
customer_reviews.text: Works great once I learned how to use it! I'm still trying to update the software. Customer service is very helpful if you can get through to them.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Old Man

customer_reviews.title: Here fishy, fishy!
customer_reviews.text: All I know is that my husband loves his Humminbird HELIX 5!
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: Works at 37mph
customer_reviews.text: Love this sonar -gps . I cut all the nonrelevent pages out then it was easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lance H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Missing knob for attaching
customer_reviews.text: Can’t write a review for performance yet, don’t know how to request missing knob when Amazon is the supplier. Ended up jerry-rigging a knob, fish finder works fine.
customer_reviews.author: desertwiffie

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: perfect, just what I was looking for. A simple to operate GPS/Depth finder and a real affordable price. The unit was easy to install and equally easy to operate. The shipping was fast as well. I recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Tully

customer_reviews.title: great fish finder
customer_reviews.text: made our new "dream" boat even greater now that we can finally catch some fish
customer_reviews.author: penpall

customer_reviews.title: Probably give it a better review once I figure out how to use it
customer_reviews.text: Probably give it a better review once I figure out how to use it. As of right now, still a bit confusing to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment this works great very easy to read and very easy to toggle thru the settings. Would definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Man

customer_reviews.title: The Helix 5 is compatible with the built in transducer on the Minn Kota ulterra.
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my Piranha 197 C. DI with the Helix 5 because the piranha was not compatible with my Ulterra transducer.
customer_reviews.author: thuey

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: my husband seems to love this so far. has had nothing but great things to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Lot's of features for the price. Easy to use and install.
customer_reviews.author: Leo G.

customer_reviews.title: GPS does NOT provide any trip information
customer_reviews.text: GPS chart plotter does NOT provide any trip information. Need to save tracks each time a new route is taken. Missed the window to send it back because I only had a chance to use it 3 times & wanted to give it a fair evaluation.
customer_reviews.author: NMOD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, haven't figured out all the views, but the picture is clear, and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: bobaluch

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a mid range finder.  Built in maps are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a cheaper unit. It works Great. I use it for Kayak Fishing In Guam. I can get targets down to about 400 feet, and pickup the bottom well beyond that. The base maps work great for what I need. Overall No issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H

customer_reviews.title: I gave this as a gift to my husband and ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my husband and he loves it. It does take a bit of time to install and also learn how to use it if you've never used a fishfinder before.
customer_reviews.author: Romane

customer_reviews.title: Crappie Time
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Still trying to pair Navionics with the GPS system.
customer_reviews.author: enmreal

customer_reviews.title: This is just another in the Hummingbird line of products ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just another in the Hummingbird line of products that I have owned. Works well, just don't get to use it as often as I would like
customer_reviews.author: zanzcantdance

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install, works and operates flawlessly, amazing imagery, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Big screen and full of extras
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Big screen and full of extras...mapping, fish locator, depth, boat speed, water temp, etc. Easy installation. Had a smaller Humminbird unit and most of the wiring was interchangeable, but changed it anyway for warranty compliance.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Nice- it finds the fish
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice and works well - we found the bottom and then found the fish! Best Fishes! Fishing Party! youtube
customer_reviews.author: Karen Monaghan Arnone

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Plain display. Overly general GPS. NG for black sky navigation. Overpriced for the product in an age when electronics are supposedly getting less expensive..
customer_reviews.author: S E Davis

product_meta.title: Humminbird 410210-1 HELIX 5 CHIRP GPS G2 Fish finder
product_meta.description: At Hummingbird, innovation is the core of everything we do. The new HELIX Series is no exception-delivering our full array of technologies, including the intuitive REFLEX interface, precise Broadband CHIRP, incredible Imaging SONAR and the mapmaking power of Auto Chart Live. Fueled by DNA that is unmistakably Hummingbird, the HELIX Series also features a jaw-dropping industrial design. From top to bottom, it's plain to see that finding fish runs in this family. HELIX 5 CHIRP GPS G2 HELIX 5 Series 410210-1 ​The HELIX 5 CHIRP GPS G2 with our new user interface and operating system, features ​a brilliant 800H x 480V, 5" 256 color display with backlight. CHIRP Dual Beam PLUS sonar with 4000 watts PTP power output, Precision Internal GPS Chart plotting with built-in Anima cartography with a micro SD card slot for optional maps or for saving waypoints. Maximize your angling experience with the Hummingbird HELIX 5 CHIRP GPS G2 fish finder system. ​CHIRP Frequencies (Out of Box Transducer)83 kHz: 75-95 kHz200 kHz: 175-225 kHzMaximum Depth: 1500 feetCHIRP Frequencies (Optional Purchase Transducer)Low: 28-75 kHzMed: 75-155 kHzHigh: 130-250 kHz83/200: 75-155/130-25050/200: 28-75/130-250Maximum Depth: 2500 feet
feature_bullets: Precision Internal GPS Chart plotting with built-in Anima cartography
Micro SD card slot for optional maps or for saving waypoints
CHIRP Dual Beam PLUS Sonar. Power Output RMS : 500 Watts. Power Draw : 615 mA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars306 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Humminbird 410210-1 HELIX 5 CHIRP GPS G2 Fishfinder
